---
title: "Evictions Report"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
source("analysis.R")
```

This report focuses on evictions in San Francisco. The data set contained `r num_evictions` of eviction notices.

## Zip code analysis
Here is a talbe of the 10 zip codes with the highest number of evictions.

```{r}
kable(by_zip, col.names = c("Zip Code", "Number of Evictions"))
```

## Time Series Analysis
We observed important spikes in eviction notices over time.

```{r}
month_plot
```

## Geographic analysis
Here is the spatial distribution of evictions:

```{r, warning = FALSE}
evictions_plot
```
